title: Poor hiring data points to US economic weakness
description: US private-sector hiring data released Wednesday painted a downcast picture of the job market in the world’s biggest economy, especially among small businesses. The report showed US companies shed 32,000 jobs in November, payroll firm ADP said, in a surprise …
content:
President Donald Trump and Treasury Secretary Scott Bassent must confront a worsening jobs market for Americans - Copyright AFP ANDREW CABALLERO-REYNOLDS
